name: Doritos VR Battle
description: The Doritos VR Battle is a highly interactive VR game based on movement and agility skills. A game you play alone or with your friends taking turns to beat each others scores. Find your way through the dark universe and use your weapons to battle the enemy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
